title: GET_WAVE_QUAD_AMPLITUDE
content:
0x865139A3// GetWaveQuadAmplitude
BOOL GET_WAVE_QUAD_AMPLITUDE(int waveQuad, float* waveQuadAmplitude);Parameters:waveQuad: The wave quad indexwaveQuadAmplitude: Returns: Returns true on success. Amplitude is undefined on failureExamples:Lualocal success, amplitude = GetWaveQuadAmplitude(1)
codeBlocks:
// GetWaveQuadAmplitude
